title.en: Was there...? Were there...? - Past Questions (¿Había...? preguntas en pasado)
title.es: Was there...? Were there...? - Past Questions (¿Había...? preguntas en pasado)

description.en: Learn to form questions with 'Was there...?' for singular/uncountable nouns and 'Were there...?' for plural nouns in the past. Spanish speakers often struggle with subject-verb inversion and singular/plural distinction in past questions.
description.es: Aprende a formar preguntas con 'Was there...?' para sustantivos singulares/incontables y 'Were there...?' para sustantivos plurales en el pasado. Los hispanohablantes a menudo luchan con la inversión sujeto-verbo y la distinción singular/plural en preguntas pasadas.
